net.wombatrpgs.mgnse.io
Interface ContextualFileLoader

public interface ContextualFileLoader

An interface for loading a file in a particular project context. It basically maps a few InputHandler methods with some arguments so that they don't have to get passed down all the time.

Method Summary
 java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String name)
          Loads a file from this context.
 

Method Detail

Returns:
